metadata.title: CVE-2019-10220 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Linux kernel CIFS implementation, version 4.9.0 is vulnerable to a relativepaths injection in directory entry lists.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
